metadata.title: Vessel-mounted ADCP, CTD and Ocean Color Data

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: CTD sections, acoustic Doppler current profiler (ADCP), transects, ocean color optical data. Data that are ground truth ship observations for NPMR "Influence of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange".
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data that are ground truth ship observations for NPMR "Influence of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange".

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: Requires Contributor's permission until June 2003

Use constraints: Requires Contributor's permission until June 2003
